name: Brownton Abbey: Blob Runner
description:
Background Asset Reference: (adman32 ) vg-resource.com/thread-22684.html

Blob Runner is a platforming game where you-the blob-is on a quest to reclaim his gems that he lost in a mysterious cave. Your objective is to find and collect all the gems whilst avoiding the hazards. 

Apologies for any glitches/bugs you may encounter :)
